node.title: Brendon had four broken ribs after being arrested. But police say there have been 'no complaints'
node.description: In the footage seen by the ABC, two officers pick Mr Johnson up from the ground and put him in the policeÂ divvy van before transporting him back to the police station.
node.content:
["From outside the locked gates of the Lake Cargelligo police station, Brendon Johnson's\u00a0family members scream\u00a0out to him.", "WARNING: SOME READERS MAY FIND THE FOLLOWING ACCOUNTS AND VIDEO FOOTAGE DISTRESSING", "It is the early hours of a Sunday morning in July and\u00a0their voices cut through the dark, quiet streets of the small remote town in central-west New South Wales.", "\"Oh my God, look what you f****in' did,\" one of them\u00a0screams\u00a0in a video filmed on the night and\u00a0provided to the ABC.\u00a0", "\"Youse want to hope he's OK! Uncle Brendon!\"", "", "
Ms Johnson and her family say they remember the night in question clearly.(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "Paramedics had arrived to take\u00a0the\u00a043-year-old Wiradjuri and Barkindji man from the back of a police divvy\u00a0van into the local police station.\u00a0", "He's unresponsive, and his body appears limp in their arms.\u00a0", "\"We were singing out to Brendon, but [he]\u00a0wasn't responding,\" said his mother Louise Johnson, who was watching on from behind the perimeter fencing with her grand-daughter.\u00a0", "", "
Brendon Johnson is carried into the Lake Cargelligo police station.
", "Mr Johnson had been arrested for contravening an apprehended violence order at Murrin Bridge, the Aboriginal community just outside of the town.\u00a0", "He was there for sorry business \u2014\u00a0a time of mourning for Aboriginal peoples when a family member passes.", "Some of his arrest was recorded by onlookers in the community, video which shows him unresponsive on the grass.", "The ABC has seen the footage but it is dark, shaky and hard to make out.\u00a0", "This is what the witnesses are heard saying in the video:", "In the footage, two officers pick Mr Johnson up from the ground and put him in the police\u00a0divvy van before transporting him back to the police station.", "", "
The Lake Cargelligo police station.(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "Earlier that night,\u00a0it is alleged he was beaten by police officers at Murrin Bridge.\u00a0", "Hospital records obtained by the ABC show the 43-year-old presented with four broken ribs following the arrest.\u00a0", "His mother Louise was charged on the night for behaving in an \"offensive\" manner at the police station.\u00a0", "
'No complaints received'
", "NSW Assistant Commissioner Joe Cassar said the situation escalated after Mr Johnson \"disobeyed\" a direction from police that he was under arrest.\u00a0", "\"He was charged with multiple offences that have been before the court,\" he said.", "The Assistant Commissioner said no action had\u00a0been taken to investigate whether the force used was reasonable.", "\"No complaints have been made in relation to it,\" Assistant Commissioner Cassar said.", "\"But rest assured, had they been made\u00a0[we] would have reviewed all body-worn images, we would have spoken to every witness [and] of course, interviewed the officers.\u00a0", "\"But no complaints were received.\" \u00a0", "Mr Cassar was unable to say whether body-worn camera footage was available from the arrest.", "Mr Johnson has been in custody for the past four months for the offences of resisting arrest, breaching bail and assaulting police, and agreed for his story to be told.", "", "
Brendon Johnson before he was taken into custody.(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "He has a history with the criminal justice system including for previous domestic violence incidents \u2014\u00a0something his family readily admits \u2014\u00a0but his family told the ABC\u00a0that did\u00a0not warrant the alleged\u00a0force that had\u00a0been used against him.", "
Capsicum spray incident
", "Five months before the July incident, Brendon Johnson asked his mother to call police to discuss a domestic dispute from the previous night.", "Ms Johnson said it was an \"unusual\" request from her son, as he\u00a0had never wanted to sit down and speak with police officers before.\u00a0", "", "
Louise Johnson wants police to give her son a chance.\u00a0\u00a0(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "Three police officers arrived at the house at around 9am, on a weekday in February.", "\"But they didn't want to talk,\" she said.\u00a0", "Witnesses said there was an immediate pursuit, and police stormed the house. \u00a0", "Police allege Mr Johnson threw a table at them, and within minutes, he was arrested for breaching his apprehended violence order and assault causing bodily harm.\u00a0", "Those charges were later withdrawn.", "His nephew Trey filmed the incident, in which capsicum\u00a0spray is administered to Mr Johnson's face at point blank range by a female officer, while two other officers held him face down on the ground.", "", "
Brendon being sprayed with capsicum spray during the incident.(Supplied)
", "Trey, 21, said he feared for his uncle, who has a heart condition. He said he felt helpless during the altercation", "\"I could see [Uncle Brendon] crying [I] could see it in his face, he was very, very scared.\"", "", "
Trey Wilson says he was worried for his uncle's welfare.(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "Mr Johnson was later transferred to Griffith Base Hospital.", "Medical notes show capsicum spray was administered by police to \"settle\" him.", "Ms Johnson said police had been targeting\u00a0her son unfairly.\u00a0", "\"If [the police]\u00a0only just give him a chance... things might be a bit better.\"", "", "
Brendon's family say they want police to give him a fair go.\u00a0(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "Based on the vision provided, NSW Police said the actions taken by officers, including the use of OC spray, were in line with standard policies.", "Assistant Commissioner Cassar described the technique as a \"circuit breaker\".", "\"That [the capsicum spray]\u00a0will allow police the ability to restrain correctly in a safe manner and to be able to conduct the search,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"Obviously, police work towards decontaminating the individual when the opportunity presents itself, and that's in fact what's occurred in this particular incident.\"", "", "
NSW Police say they are trying to build a better relationship with the community.(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "He said building a stronger relationship with all Aboriginal communities was a priority for the NSW police force.", "\"It's not a simple solution, but it's certainly something we will work on every day of our working career,\" he said.", "
'Everyone needs to be respected'\u00a0
", "Work is being done in many Aboriginal communities to improve the relationship with local police.\u00a0", "The Murrin Bridge Aboriginal community, which sits around 12 kilometres north of Lake Cargelligo, has around 150 residents.", "The Local Aboriginal Land Council chief executive Judy Bartholemeuw said the council had regular meetings with police.\u00a0", "", "
Judy Bartholemeuw says respect is the key.(ABC News: Brendan Esposito)
", "\"Even through COVID they supported us when we needed to make sure the community at Murrin Bridge was safe,\" she said.", "\"The Johnson family needs to have respect. The police need to have respect, [so it is] better for the community, better for that family.", "\"Everyone needs to be respected.\"", "", "
Louise Johnson says she\u00a0wants police to treat her family fairly.(ABC News: Brenden Esposito)
", "The national Aboriginal Legal Service has called for an immediate overhaul of police culture and powers, and wants changes to legislation, cultural competency training and mandatory sentencing.\u00a0", "For Louise Johnson, and others on the ground, time is of the essence."]
